talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

$Head Merchant Jamihwa${sound:npc_Jamiwha_qu9899_sp_01.ogg}
What brings you here?

${user_nick}$
I'm tired of waiting. I want to see Hwaran now.

$Head Merchant Jamihwa${sound:npc_Jamiwha_qu9899_sp_02.ogg}
Why are you coming to a merchant like me to see the lady of Red Lotus Palace? You're quite bold. Hehehe...

${user_nick}$
She told me to wait because she needed more time to develop the medicine, but it's past time now.
At least let me know where I can meet her.

$Head Merchant Jamihwa${sound:npc_Jamiwha_qu9899_sp_03.ogg}
You should go to the palace to see the lady of Red Lotus Palace, obviously.

$Finest Stone Jade$
(A mysterious stone with a greenish glow.)

$Head Merchant Jamihwa${sound:npc_Jamiwha_qu9899_sp_04.ogg}
It's not somewhere just anyone can come and go easily, but you might be an exception, {user_nick}.
She won't refuse the strong warrior who took down Commander Jade and won the Combat Tournament.

$Head Merchant Jamihwa${sound:npc_Jamiwha_qu9899_sp_05.ogg}
I assure you that the Red Lotus Palace Gate of Contemplation will be open wide to you, {user_nick}.

$Head Merchant Jamihwa${sound:npc_Jamiwha_qu9899_sp_06.ogg}
After passing through the gate, you will see the center of Red Lotus Palace, Taeryeong Shrine.
Taeryeong Shrine is the place where Hwaran, Commander of the Southern Territory sees to her affairs.

$Head Merchant Jamihwa${sound:npc_Jamiwha_qu9899_sp_07.ogg}
Just be sure to mind your manners if you want to enter the palace.
※ Speak with Commander Hwaran at Taeryeong Shrine of Red Lotus Palace.

$Commander Hwaran$
You seem to be in quite a hurry. It's not like I don't know how you feel.

${user_nick}$
Please show me the treasure vault, as promised.

$Commander Hwaran$
Hehe... Don't worry, I'll let you in. There's no need to be so impatient. But I do have one condition.

$Commander Hwaran${sound:npc_Hwaran_qu9899_sp_01.ogg}
I naturally detest turmoil and confusion, so to make this as simple as possible you'll have to go in there alone.

${user_nick}$
I will.

$Commander Hwaran${sound:npc_Hwaran_qu9899_sp_02.ogg}
I am glad to work with someone so quick-witted. On your way here, you must have seen the small gate guarded by the Royal Guard.
I already notified him, so go straight there.
※ (Solo) Speak with the Royal Guard in Red Lotus Palace.

$Red Lotus Palace Royal Guard${sound:npc_GoldSoldier_qu9899_sp_01.ogg}
This is the store house of Lady Hwaran, the Silver Treasure Vault!
It's a place where only rare items are stored!
For a human like you, even standing before the door like this is against the law!

${user_nick}$
I came here with Hwaran's permission.

$Red Lotus Palace Royal Guard${sound:npc_GoldSoldier_qu9899_sp_02.ogg}
I know! That's why I'm only yelling instead of arresting you! Ugh! I'm so angry!
I didn't get this job to open the door for the likes of you!

$Red Lotus Palace Royal Guard${sound:npc_GoldSoldier_qu9899_sp_03.ogg}
What are you waiting for? Go in before I kick your ass!
※ Press the [Continue] button to go to the Silver Treasure Vault.

$Red Lotus Palace Royal Guard$
You intend to violate Lady Hwaran's orders? Good, that means I get to arrest you!
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

$Red Lotus Palace Royal Guard${sound:npc_GoldSoldier_qu9899_sp_04.ogg}
Oh, I see you've been kicked out by Monk Wangpung!
※ Press the [Continue] button to go to the Silver Treasure Vault.

$Red Lotus Palace Royal Guard$
You're lucky you weren't killed!
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

$Warehouse Keeper Monk Wangpung${sound:npc_Wangpung_qu9899_sp_01.ogg}
Stay away from my treasure...! No, I mean the lady's treasure... right now!

${user_nick}$
I came here with Hwaran's permission.

$Warehouse Keeper Monk Wangpung$
Bahaha! She merely let you in the Silver Treasure Vault.
Letting you actually take treasure is a different story.
In here, you have to give something to take something. Understand?

${user_nick}$
Are you suggesting a trade?

$Warehouse Keeper Monk Wangpung$
A trade? You can't use such a lowly term for the lady's merciful consideration.
Lady Hwaran gives anyone a chance to take what they need from here.

$Warehouse Keeper Monk Wangpung$
So if you take what you want from the Silver Treasure Vault, you're indebted to the lady.
It's one's duty to repay a kindness, isn't it?

$Red Lotus Palace Royal Guard${sound:npc_GoldSoldier_qu9899_sp_04.ogg}
Oh, I see you've been kicked out by Monk Wangpung!
※ Press the [Continue] button to go to the Silver Treasure Vault.

$Red Lotus Palace Royal Guard$
You're lucky you weren't killed!
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

$Huge Cup$
(An oddly shaped goblet with a lower part featuring a pedestal and legs, as expected of a cup, but also with a lid on the top. At first glance, it seems very heavy, as if made of a copious amount of fused metal!)

$Red Lotus Palace Royal Guard${sound:npc_GoldSoldier_qu9899_sp_04.ogg}
Oh, I see you've been kicked out by Monk Wangpung!
※ Press the [Continue] button to go to the Silver Treasure Vault.

$Red Lotus Palace Royal Guard$
You're lucky you weren't killed!
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

$Warehouse Keeper Monk Wangpung$
Uhhh… Ah...

$Finest Stone Jade$
(A mysterious stone with a greenish glow.)

$Red Lotus Palace Royal Guard${sound:npc_GoldSoldier_qu9899_sp_04.ogg}
Oh, I see you've been kicked out by Monk Wangpung!
※ Press the [Continue] button to go to the Silver Treasure Vault.

$Red Lotus Palace Royal Guard$
You're lucky you weren't killed!
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

$Huge Cup$
(An oddly shaped goblet with a lower part featuring a pedestal and legs, as expected of a cup, but also with a huge lid on the top. At first glance, it seems very heavy, as if made of a copious amount of fused metal!)

$Warehouse Keeper Monk Wangpung${sound:npc_Wangpung_qu9899_sp_02.ogg}
S, stop...! I can't let you go like that!

${user_nick}$
Oh yeah? (Wordlessly brandishes weapon.)

$Warehouse Keeper Monk Wangpung${sound:npc_Wangpung_qu9899_sp_03.ogg}
Hey! Listen to me.(Crouches and rubs hands together.)

${user_nick}$
…….?

$Warehouse Keeper Monk Wangpung$
I have as many mouths as there are lanterns on the street that need feeding.

${user_nick}$
Childs have no family! And what's with your tone?

$Warehouse Keeper Monk Wangpung$
Please!! All I'm asking is that you show some mercy and listen!
I don't care if you take the black thing or whatever, just give me THAT back.
I will be a dead meat without THAT.

${user_nick}$
What is this anyway?

$Warehouse Keeper Monk Wangpung$
Ummmm... it's nothing. It's not worth anything to you.
But I will die without it…!

${user_nick}$
All right, then you also need to give me something in return. You told me that if you want to take something, you should give something, right?

$Warehouse Keeper Monk Wangpung$
(Looks surprised and hesitant.)
If I want to take something, I should give something in return… of course!
Just give me a second!

$Warehouse Keeper Monk Wangpung$
Look, this treasure is a certificate of appointment written by Lady Hwaran! Observe the flowing and elegant handwriting
and even her rare signature. Tada! It's worth having. One. Hundred. Percent.

${user_nick}$
Next.

$Warehouse Keeper Monk Wangpung$
(Sweating profusely.) This treasure is a leaf that Hwaran once stepped on and has been crystallized with sap.
It's the rarest thing you'll ever find...

$Red Lotus Palace Royal Guard${sound:npc_GoldSoldier_qu9899_sp_04.ogg}
Oh, I see you've been kicked out by Monk Wangpung!
※ Press the [Continue] button to go to the Silver Treasure Vault.

$Red Lotus Palace Royal Guard$
You're lucky you weren't killed!
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

$Finest Stone Jade$
(A mysterious stone with a greenish glow.)

$Warehouse Keeper Monk Wangpung${sound:npc_Wangpung_qu9899_sp_04.ogg}
Where did it go? I'm dead if I lost it! Oh no... Dead... Dead I said!
※ Speak with Commander Hwaran in Taeryeong Shrine.

$Commander Hwaran$
Here you are. You were so loud that the roof tiles of the whole palace were jolting.
So, you got what you wanted, right?

$Commander Hwaran$
You left all the treasure behind and only took that lump of iron?
<html>$Quest Complete$</html>

$Red Lotus Palace Royal Guard$
You're lucky you weren't killed.

qstep_change.comment: 2,3,4,5_파티라 이동 못한 유저를 위한 대화 6,7,8,9,10_왕풍대사 사냥
2,3_왕풍대사 사냥(안씀) 4,5,6,7_파티라 이동 못한 유저를 위한 대화
0,1,2퀘스트 아이템 3,4,5,6,_파티라 이동 못한 유저를 위한 대화
0,1,2퀘스트 아이템 3,4,5,6,_파티라 이동 못한 유저를 위한 대화

journal.title: To Taeryeong Shrine, Red Lotus Palace
journal.contents:
Hwaran told you to wait until she makes the Mysterious Disease Antidote, but you can probably go to the treasure vault first. Head Merchant Jamihwa of the Goldfish Merchant Guild frequently communicates with Red Lotus Palace and may know the answer. You should speak with Head Merchant Jamihwa.

Red Lotus Palace Main Street-Head Merchant Jamihwa

journal.title: Beyond Taeryeong Shrine Gate
journal.contents:
Jamihwa tells you to enter the palace in an absurdly casual manner. She says you can enter Taeryeong Shrine, the central audience chamber, by passing through the Gate of Contemplation, the main entrance of Red Lotus Palace. That's right. It's finally time to enter the palace.

Red Lotus Palace Main Street (Taeryeong Shrine) - Commander Hwaran
journal.destination: Speak with Commander Hwaran in Taeryeong Shrine.
journal.todo_msg: Enter the palace and speak with Commander Hwaran in Taeryeong Shrine.

journal.title: Impertinent Royal Guard
journal.contents:
Hwaran says that you must go alone. You have no choice but to meet her conditions. Somehow nothing comes easy in this palace. First, go speak with the Red Lotus Palace Royal Guard.
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

Red Lotus Palace Main Street (Taeryeong Shrine) - Red Lotus Palace Royal Guard
journal.destination: (Solo) Speak with Red Lotus Palace Royal Guard in Taeryeong Shrine
journal.todo_msg: Speak with Red Lotus Palace Royal Guard.

journal.title: Forcing the Warehouse Keeper
journal.contents:
After dealing with the threats of the Red Lotus Palace Royal Guard, a man named Warehouse Keeper Monk Wangpung blocked your way. You better talk your way out of this.
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.
※ Speak with the Red Lotus Palace Royal Guard to enter the Silver Treasure Vault.

Red Lotus Palace Main Street (Taeryeong Shrine) - Silver Treasure Vault (Warehouse Keeper Monk Wangpung)
journal.destination: (Solo) Find the Cup of Healing in the Silver Treasure Vault
journal.todo_msg: Find the Cup of Healing in the Silver Treasure Vault.

journal.title: Dealing with an Unreasonable Demand
journal.contents:
When asked to give something to get something, you offered your precious treasure, but even that didn't work. There's no other choice. You'll have to use force and make it work somehow.
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.
※ Speak with the Red Lotus Palace Royal Guard to enter the Silver Treasure Vault.

Red Lotus Palace Main Street (Taeryeong Shrine) - Silver Treasure Vault (Warehouse Keeper Monk Wangpung)
journal.todo_msg: Take down Warehouse Keeper Monk Wangpung.

journal.title: Prize of the Silver Treasure Vault
journal.contents:
Warehouse Keeper Monk Wangpung has fallen. The time has come to find the Cup of Healing. Could that huge cup be the Cup of Healing?
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.
※ Speak with the Red Lotus Palace Royal Guard to enter the Silver Treasure Vault.

Red Lotus Palace Main Street (Taeryeong Shrine) - Silver Treasure Vault (Huge Cup)

journal.title: Real Treasure
journal.contents:
After somehow managing to tuck away the heavy cup, you noticed a strange stone on the ground. You don't want to increase the burden of your inventory any further, but it's so eye-catching that you can't just leave it. It would be best to just hang onto it for now.
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.
※ Speak with the Red Lotus Palace Royal Guard to enter the Silver Treasure Vault.

Red Lotus Palace Main Street (Taeryeong Shrine) - Silver Treasure Vault (Finest Stone Jade)
journal.todo_msg: Something fell nearby. Go examine it.

journal.title: Vain Struggle
journal.contents:
You finally got the stone and were about to leave the Silver Treasure Vault when you heard someone moaning and stirring. You look back to find Warehouse Keeper Monk Wangpung, who had been knocked out until just now. He looks your way and opens his mouth to say something.
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.
※ Speak with the Red Lotus Palace Royal Guard to enter the Silver Treasure Vault.

Red Lotus Palace Main Street (Taeryeong Shrine) - Silver Treasure Vault (Warehouse Keeper Monk Wangpung)
journal.destination: (Solo) Speak with Warehouse Keeper Monk Wangpung
journal.todo_msg: Speak with Warehouse Keeper Monk Wangpung.

journal.title: Empty Talk
journal.contents:
You turned your back on Monk Wangpung, who only offered ridiculous items in return for the stone. Now go talk to Hwaran.

Red Lotus Palace Main Street (Taeryeong Shrine) - Commander Hwaran
journal.destination: Speak with Commander Hwaran in Taeryeong Shrine.
journal.todo_msg: Speak with Commander Hwaran in Taeryeong Shrine
